channel.title: What game is this?
channel.description:
I remember when I was very very young I used to play a weird first person game. I remember a training part of the game I constantly played because I was so bad at the campaign and or the multiplayer. It was sort of like Hazard Course in Half-Life except it was outside in some kind of camp.
Pretty damn big camp and the thing I remember best is jumping over and ducking under some huge tree logs. The area was pretty damn dark because it was in the middle of the night in game and I think it was raining as well.
The cover was some red symbol that looked as if someone had taken it into photoshop, put a white layer above and then lowered the opacity of the white layer to 50%.
Detailed it the best I could. Can anyone help?

item.title: What game is this?
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

Hidden & Dangerous 2 is a third-person game while the one I thought about was first-person.

It can be played in first- or third-person, there’s also an overhead “tactical map” view. Almost always used first person, myself.

The training camp in H&D 2 has trees around it but doesn’t really look much like a giant forest.

Read full topic

item.title: What game is this?
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
Hidden & Dangerous 2 is a third-person game while the one I thought about was first-person. And Brothers in Arms is way too graphically advanced to be it, I was playing this in like 2001 I think?

It might be Project I.G.I. but I’m not too sure, I’ll have to try it and get back to you.

EDIT: Maybe it’ll help a bit more if I told you that the camp was situated in a giant forest? Hence the logs ‘n’ all that.

Read full topic

item.title: What game is this?
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Possibly Project I.G.I.: I’m Going In?

The only game I’ve played (that I can think of) that has a training mission in a big camp in the rain is Hidden & Dangerous 2, but that’s not at night and the cover doesn’t look like what you described. Hmm.

EDIT: Some of the Brothers in Arms games start in the dark while it’s raining, the tutorials make you jump over and crouch under some fallen trees…

Read full topic

item.title: What game is this?
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
I can definetely remember playing on PC, so it can’t be a Playstation exclusive like Delta Force UW.

Read full topic

item.title: What game is this?
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

I don’t think it can be Delta Force, because Delta Force’s symbol is blue on a red background, while I talked about a completely red symbol on a white background.

Whoops, was thinking of a different Delta Force game (doesn’t really fit either) and didn’t look at the wiki page I linked to properly

Do you know the platform of the game and what year (roughly) you played it?

Read full topic

item.title: What game is this?
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
It’s not Ghost Recon and I don’t think it can be Delta Force, because Delta Force’s symbol is blue on a red background, while I talked about a completely red symbol on a white background.

Read full topic
